content: REITs SeedlyTV EP05 Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019If REITs are giving such high returns, why should we even look at other assets like SSBs or fixed deposits? These give lower returns than REITs dividends.?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 May 2019SSBs and fixed deposits will pay a return based on the stated amount, guaranteed in a way. This will be stated before you start the transaction. More or less capital guaranteed as well.Returns from Reits are never guaranteed. Besides, the share price may drop and you incur a paper loss. Btw, returns from reits are not exactly 'high'.0 comments0
